TextView.android:text: I am a soft spoken, honest & talented person. I have a good job, decent salary & a nice house to live in. I think family as the first priority of my life. I think 5 years down the life I should be happily settled with my kids, a lovely soulmate with all the blessings of our parents & relatives. I am modern thinker but also believe in good values given by our ancestors I also enjoy travelling, watching movies, going out for dinner, and having great intellectual conversations!
Earn INR 4 Lakh To & Lakh annually
